alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 7:28PM EDT until August 12 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harrison County in east central Ohio... Southwestern Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Guernsey County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Belmont County in east central Ohio... Southeastern Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Freeport, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... St. Clairsville, Cadiz, Freeport, Tiltonsville, Bethesda, Flushing, Adena, Dillonvale, Mount Pleasant, Belmont, Rayland, Holloway, New Athens, Morristown, Neffs, Harrisville, Tippecanoe, Piedmont, Deersville, and Barkcamp State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 203 and 222. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Ohio. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
